short_description: Discover the Cayman Islands, a British Overseas Territory in the Caribbean known for its world-class diving, pristine beaches, and financial services hub. Experience crystal-clear waters, stunning coral reefs, luxury resorts, and the warm hospitality of this tropical paradise.

health.tap_water_safety: Safe to drink - excellent water quality
alcohol_info: It is prohibited to sell, serve, or offer alcohol beverages to anyone under the age of 18
Alcohol can be purchased from licensed venues, restaurants, and stores
US Dollar is widely accepted alongside the Cayman Islands Dollar

tipping.hotels: Tipping is appreciated for porters ($1-2 per bag) and housekeeping ($2-5 per day)
tipping.guides: 10-15% tip is appreciated for tour guides
tipping.restaurants: 15-20% tip is customary for good service, though some restaurants may include a service charge

weather.title: The Cayman Islands have a tropical marine climate with warm temperatures year-round. The islands experience a dry season from November to April and a wet season from May to October, with consistent trade winds providing pleasant conditions.

when_to_visit.title: Dry Season
when_to_visit.short_description: Perfect weather with low humidity, minimal rainfall, and warm temperatures. This is the peak tourist season, ideal for beach activities, water sports, diving, and outdoor adventures. Best time for snorkeling and exploring the islands

when_to_visit.title: Shoulder Season
when_to_visit.short_description: Warm temperatures with occasional brief showers. Fewer crowds and lower prices make this a great time to visit. Still excellent weather for beach activities, water sports, and diving

when_to_visit.title: Wet Season
when_to_visit.short_description: Higher humidity and more frequent rain showers, with peak hurricane season in September. Lower prices and fewer tourists, but be aware of weather conditions. Still possible to enjoy activities between rain showers

weather.best_time: The best time to visit the Cayman Islands is during the dry season from November to April when the weather is perfect with low humidity, minimal rainfall, and ideal conditions for beach activities, water sports, and diving
